title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Al Bernstein and Stephen Espinoza stop by
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Al Bernstein and Stephen Espinoza stop by
description:
Chris talks with the legendary boxing broadcaster, Al Bernstein about Claressa Shields getting back in the ring to take on Savannah Marshall and what it will do for the sports. They also dive into the Ray Vargas-Mark Magsayo and what we can expect from that. Later, the President of Showtime Sports, Stephen Espinoza joins Chris to discuss the latest with Boxing on Showtime. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
